snippet: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. On January 31, 2016 peacefully, surrounded by family, Gail left the world of the living and joined her parents in the Garden of G-D. Magnificent and beautiful Gail's time came too soon for her loved ones. Her kindness, beauty, graciousness, wit, and elegance, will shine on. Beloved wife of Richard H. M. Maidman, loving ex-wife of Stephen D. Haymes. Nurturing mother of Evan A. Haymes (Regina) and Starr H. Kempin (Jacques). Kind stepmother of Patrick (Jacqueline, departed) Maidman, Mitchel (Arlene) Maidman and Dagny (Molly) Maidman. Loving Momma Gail of Esme, Theodore Haymes and Sterling Kempin. Loving Step-Momma Gail to Allison, Beatrice, Jonathan, Harrison, Julia, Ezra, Sage and Cassidy Maidman. For Shiva Information, please call 212-755-2595. Celebration Service to be held Wednesday, April 6, 11am at Temple Emanu-El, Fifth Avenue at 65th Street. Donation can be made to either: The Gail Ann Lowe Maidman Scholarship Fund at the American Academy of Dramatic Arts c/o Susan Zech, President, 120 Madison Avenue, NYC, NY 10016 or to The Gail Ann Lowe Maidman Fund at the Jewish Communal Fund, 575 Madison Ave., New York, NY 10022. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MAIDMAN, GAIL ANN LOWE
